articles.title: Lego unveils tech-filled Smart Bricks - to play experts' dismay - BBC
articles.description: Lego says its new tech-enabled products are its "most revolutionary innovation" since it launched its mini-figurines in 1978.
articles.content:
Shiona McCallum,Senior technology reporter, CES in Las Vegas,
Emma Calder,Technology reporters
Lego has unveiled Smart Bricks - tech-filled versions of its small building blocks - which it says wil… [+4586 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Intel launches Core Ultra Series 3 CPUs, made using its long-awaited 18A process - Ars Technica
articles.description: New chips launch "this month," targeting high-end ultraportable PCs.
